fields.title: Airplay2
fields.desc: Make this stream Airplay2; only one Airplay2 stream can be running at a time.
fields.name: ap2

fields.title: Frequency
fields.desc: Enter an FM frequency 87.5 to 107.9. Requires an RTL-SDR compatible USB dongle.
fields.name: freq

fields.title: URL
fields.desc: Enter the URL of the radio station.
fields.name: url

fields.title: Server
fields.desc: Optional LMS server host (without port). Examples: mylmsserver; 127.0.0.1
fields.name: server

fields.title: Port
fields.desc: Optional LMS server port, defaults to 9000 if not input
fields.name: port

fields.title: Station ID
fields.desc: Station ID is the numeric section of a Pandora station link. Example: ID = 4610303469018478727 from https://www.pandora.com/station/play/4610303469018478727
fields.name: station

fields.title: URL
fields.desc: Enter the url of the file to play. Example: https://www.nasa.gov/mp3/640149main_Computers%20are%20in%20Control.mp3
fields.name: url
